verbs.description: President Donald Trump and German Chancellor Angela Merkel [V: will] speak with the media at a joint news conference at the White House on Friday .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump and German Chancellor Angela Merkel] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: speak] [ARG2: with the media] [ARGM-LOC: at a joint news conference at the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] .
